input.activity_signal: Recent FCC filing (2024-11-26) with 3 filings for numbering authorization. Active company website found via search (telimize.com) describing current services. Listed on business platforms like Clutch.co and Crunchbase with active contact information (sales@telimize.com, 707-371-6927). CEO Grantham Hamm identified in FCC documents.
input.product_summary: Telimize provides cloud communication solutions including UCaaS, SIP trunking, VoIP services, messaging APIs, and WhatsApp APIs for business connectivity through calls, messages, meetings, and events.
